exercises.name: Level 2
exercises.description: Learn ascending intervals: Major 2nd, Perfect 5th, and Perfect Octave
exercises.introText: Time to expand your interval recognition! In this level, you'll learn to distinguish between ascending Major 2nds, Perfect 5ths, and Perfect Octaves. These are some of the most recognizable intervals in music.

metadata.description: Melody Bricks exercises for ear training
